senses.sense_definition: A male given name of Arabic origin.

examples.text: My neighbor <w>Ali</w> helped me fix my car yesterday.
<w>Ali</w> is a very popular name in many parts of the world.
Please send the report to Mr. <w>Ali</w> in the accounting department.
The <w>Ali</w> family has lived in this town for three generations.

senses.sense_definition: A short form of the female given name <w>Alison</w>.

examples.text: Her name is Alison, but she prefers to be called <w>Ali</w>.
<w>Ali</w> and her sister went to the cinema together.

senses.sense_definition: The cousin and son-in-law of the Islamic prophet Muhammad, considered by Shias to be the first Imam.

examples.text: Many historical texts discuss the leadership of <w>Ali</w> during the early Islamic period.
The shrine of <w>Ali</w> is a major pilgrimage site.

senses.sense_definition: A short form of the male given name <w>Alistair</w>.

examples.text: <w>Ali</w> is just a nickname; his full name on the passport is Alistair.
We are waiting for <w>Ali</w> to arrive before we start the meeting.
